economyPhilosophy: Players should feel progression but not grind. Average 30-40 hours to unlock most content, 60-80 hours to unlock everything.

raceComplete.description: Base: 250cr, Gold medal on Hard = 250 + 200 + (450 * 2.0) = 1350cr first time, 900cr repeat

statImpactMultiplier.description: Parts with higher total stat bonuses cost more
statImpactMultiplier.example: Rare Engine (4000cr base) with +50% total stats = 4000 * 1.5 = 6000cr

level1.description: First upgrade is 50% of part base cost

level2.description: Second upgrade is 75% of part base cost

level3.description: Third upgrade equals part base cost

level4.description: Fourth upgrade is 150% of part base cost

level5.description: Max upgrade is 200% of part base cost

upgradeCosts.description: Fully upgrading a part costs 575% of base cost (expensive but powerful)

skinCosts.description: Skins are cosmetic so generally cheaper than parts

repairCost.description: Optional repair costs after crashes - currently disabled for better player experience

maintenanceCosts.description: Maintenance disabled to avoid punishing new players

loadoutCosts.description: Cost to unlock additional loadout slots (first is free)

creditsPerHour.description: Expected earning rates for different skill levels

totalContentValue.description: Total credits needed to unlock everything

balancingNotes.earlyGame: Players earn 500-1000cr per race, can afford Common/Uncommon parts quickly
balancingNotes.midGame: Level 20-30 players earn 2000-4000cr per race, saving for Epic parts
balancingNotes.lateGame: Level 40+ players earn 5000+ per race, can afford Legendary and max upgrades
balancingNotes.catchUpMechanics: Daily bonuses, achievements, and first-time bonuses help new players progress faster
balancingNotes.avoidGrind: Players should never feel stuck. Always multiple paths to earn credits.

monetizationConsiderations.description: Currently single-currency (credits) earned through gameplay only. Can add premium currency later if needed.

accelerators.description: Optional accelerators, not required for progression

starterPack.description: Good value bundle for new players
